general_advisory: As per IMD forecast, Dry weather is expected for next 5 days. As there is a chance of dry weather condition along with an increase in maximum temperature expected during upcoming days, farmers are advised to apply fertilizer after draining out excess water under waterlogged conditions and continue spraying operations during that period. Prevailing weather conditions are favorable for pest and disease incidence, so farmers are advised to monitor the fields regularly. Avoid grazing/feeding of cattle during noon hours due to an expected increase in maximum temperature.

advisory: Farmers are advised to apply top dressing of urea fertilizer in rice plants after draining out excess water.
